Java SE 14 & JDK 14

Uses of Interface
javax.tools.JavaCompiler.CompilationTask

Packages that use JavaCompiler.CompilationTask 
Package Description
com.sun.source.util
Provides utilities for operations on abstract syntax trees (AST).
javax.tools
Provides interfaces for tools which can be invoked from a program, for example, compilers.

  • Uses of JavaCompiler.CompilationTask in com.sun.source.util

    Classes in com.sun.source.util that implement JavaCompiler.CompilationTask 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  JavacTask
    Provides access to functionality specific to the JDK Java Compiler, javac.
    Methods in com.sun.source.util with parameters of type JavaCompiler.CompilationTask 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static DocTrees DocTrees.instance​(JavaCompiler.CompilationTask task)
    Returns a DocTrees object for a given CompilationTask.
    static Trees Trees.instance​(JavaCompiler.CompilationTask task)
    Returns a Trees object for a given CompilationTask.

  • Uses of JavaCompiler.CompilationTask in javax.tools

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    JavaCompiler.CompilationTask JavaCompiler.getTask​(Writer out, JavaFileManager fileManager, DiagnosticListener<? super JavaFileObject> diagnosticListener, Iterable<String> options, Iterable<String> classes, Iterable<? extends JavaFileObject> compilationUnits)
    Creates a future for a compilation task with the given components and arguments.
